UNIWA lays special emphasis on safeguarding the principles of objectivity, meritocracy and transparency on all decisions taken by the administration bodies.

Thereby, UNIPA publishes all the decisions of its governing bodies, at a University and School level, pertaining to the management of its resources. Implementing the above approach, UNIPA provides all the available information regarding its administration bodies and their decisions on its official website.
